author: Stereogum
title: The Spirit Of The Beehive – “Cops Come Looking” Video
text: Next month, the Spirit Of The Beehive will release their new album, Pleasure Suck, the follow-up to 2015's You Are Arrived (But You've Been Cheated) EP. We've already heard " Ricky (Caught Me Tryin') ," and today they're sharing a new song (along with a video put together by Federico Casanova) called "Cops Come Looking." … More »
